name: Stars Pong
description:
Stars Pong is a game where you pong with two players but with stars on the background. You can play it on Windows or macOS. You can quit it by pressing alt + f4|command + q. The controls are: Up arrow and down arrow for player 1(left) and w and s for player 2(right). After download:

1. Unzip

2. Go to the folder where it says you're type of OS

3. Double click on Pong.exe|StarsPong to start the game 

4. If it says "Windows protected your PC" then click on the little "More info" button and then click on "Run anyway".

5. Ignore the "_MACOSX" folder

6. Enjoy :)
